Who benefits? Prior art.</p> <h2>Design</h2> <ul><li>Topics and envelopes</li> <li>Components/APIs (if any)</li> <li>Compatibility and migration</li> </ul> <h2>Alternatives</h2> <p>What else did you consider and why not?</p> <h2>Adoption Plan</h2> <p>How to roll out and document.</p> <h2>Open Questions</h2> <p>List unresolved items.</p> </article> <footer class="docs-footer"> <a href="https://github.com/chrisrobison/pan/edit/main/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/rfc.md" target="_blank"> Edit this page on GitHub </a> </footer> </main> </div> <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/11.9.0/highlight.min.js"></script> <script src="../assets/docs.js"></script> </body> </html>
